me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bungeecord

Class DefaultServerTeleportationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bungeecord.DefaultServerTeleportationManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerTeleportationManager

    public final class DefaultServerTeleportationManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerTeleportationManager
    The default implementation of cross server teleportation on BungeeCord networks.
    Author:
    Glen Husman
    See Also:
    ServerTeleportationManager, ServerTransportManager

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultServerTeleportationManager

        public DefaultServerTeleportationManager(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin instance)
        Creates a server transport manager.

        This constructor should only be invoked by the GBukkitCore plugin instance.
        Parameters:
        instance - The host plugin.

    • Method Detail

      • getServerTransporter

        public ServerTransportManager getServerTransporter()

      • getTeleport

        public QueuedTeleport<java.lang.String> getTeleport(org.bukkit.entity.Player teleport)
        Description copied from interface: ServerTeleportationManager
        Gets the queued teleportation of the specified player. Queued teleports that have already executed (for cross-server operations) may return null on some methods.
        Specified by:
        getTeleport in interface ServerTeleportationManager
        Parameters:
        teleport - The player who's teleport will be returned.
        Returns:
        The last queued teleport of the specified player, or null if none. The destination of the teleport will be the name of the server.

      • teleportPlayer

        public QueuedTeleport<java.lang.String> teleportPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                              java.lang.String targetServer)
        Description copied from interface: ServerTeleportationManager
        Queues the specified player to be teleported to the specified server after the default delay. Queued teleportation cancelled upon movement or receiving damage. If the player has the permission node gbukkitcore.tpdelay.bypass, the teleportation will be instant.
        Specified by:
        teleportPlayer in interface ServerTeleportationManager
        Parameters:
        player - The player to teleport.
        targetServer - The server to teleport to.
        Returns:
        The queued teleport, or null if it was instant.

      • teleportPlayer

        public QueuedTeleport<java.lang.String> teleportPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                              java.lang.String targetServer,
                                              int teleportDelay)
        Description copied from interface: ServerTeleportationManager
        Queues the specified player to be teleported to the specified server after the specified delay. Queued teleportation cancelled upon movement or receiving damage.
        Specified by:
        teleportPlayer in interface ServerTeleportationManager
        Parameters:
        player - The player to teleport.
        targetServer - The server to teleport to.
        teleportDelay - The delay, in seconds, after which the player will be teleported. If this value is 0 OR the player has the permission node gbukkitcore.tpdelay.bypass, the teleportation will be instant.
        Returns:
        The queued teleport, or null if it was instant.
